yelp_reviews.author: Lucia C.
yelp_reviews.review: I'll say immediately that I'm not familiar with Woodrose. (I rated 'average' because I had to choose something.) I'm looking at reviews of apartments for older people. The reviews here are all negative, but I have also noticed that they all seem to have been written by the same person. Same syntax, vocabulary, and complaints. I hope that Yelp can look into this.

google_reviews.author: April Johnson
google_reviews.review: Overall,  Woodrose Apartments are in a great location!  The beautiful complex is on the Bus Line!  There is easily access to restaurants,  grocery stores,  coffee shops,  Goodwill,  Home Goods and Lowe's.   Barley Village has a wonderful movie theater and there is great music and family entertainment on the Green during the summertime!

owner_response.text: Hi April, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us and highlighting the benefits to living in this neighborhood!

google_reviews.author: Jessie Bass
google_reviews.review: I have had occasion to visit Woodrose Apartments. I was impressed with the facilities, both inside and out. The outer grounds were well maintained and the plants and shrubs were groomed and manicured. The inside was bright, welcoming, clean, well taken care of, and was laid out in understandable and well reasoned manner. The rooms were spacious and well designed. The staff I encountered were kind, courteous, helpful, and knowledgeable. Having been in several other apartment buildings in the area, I have no problem recommending Woodrose Apartments to anyone.

owner_response.text: Thank you Jessie for leaving us such a positive review! We are glad to hear that both our property and our staff have left such a great impression. We appreciate your recommendation!

google_reviews.author: Angie Jones
google_reviews.review: Ive visited Woodrose Apartments on several occasions over the last two years. The outside grounds are well kept. Upon entering the building, I always notice the floors, tables and mirrors are always clean and dust free (I can say the same about the upper floors also). The public restroom on the first floor is ALWAYS clean and well stocked. Ive been very impressed!

owner_response.text: Hi Angie Jones, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

google_reviews.author: Jim Gossage
google_reviews.review: Kelsi and Hunter reacted very quickly to my request.  Rewiring and adding LED bulbs to my kitchen light fixture was performed competently and efficiently.

owner_response.text: Hi, we love receiving a high rating, and appreciate your positive review! We hope you'll consider us again in the future!

google_reviews.author: Karriem Dixon
google_reviews.review: Im so thankful Kelsi Peterson, is doing such a great job with the Woodrose Apartments. She is very helpful, attentive and friendly. I visited with my sister there recently and it is comforting to know that my sister lives in a safe, clean, organized and friendly apartment complex.

owner_response.text: Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

google_reviews.author: Hal McFarland
google_reviews.review: Kelsi and Adam (Management) are very friendly and accommodating. They strive to make Woodrose the standard by which senior housing is judged. This same approach is also true for the maintenance crew, who are very friendly, knowledgeable and always in time. Just a really nice community of residents, along with fun activities (card games, arts and crafts, bbq smoker and grills, etc.), monthly and weekly events (e.g., potlucks and a Friday Lunch provided by a classically trained chef who, along with his wife, operates a food pantry for the residents.) Really, living here has worked out so well for me. Thanks Woodrose!

owner_response.text: Hal, thank you for your kind review! Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you have found this to be the case. We will be sure to pass along your comments to the team here at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments!

google_reviews.author: Karmen Haywood
google_reviews.review: I would like to say Kelsi is doing a great job with keeping the building nice and clean and quiet. Its a beautiful apartment building. The people are very friendly. Its nice to know that my family member is living in a great environment!

owner_response.text: Hi Karmen Haywood, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

They are always so helpful and congenial. The grounds are also impeccably maintained on a consistant basis.

owner_response.text: Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

google_reviews.author: Lucy C
google_reviews.review:
Well maintained, clean, safe, pet friendly, plenty of parking, and beautiful courtyard. A nice community for independent seniors.

The staff is wonderful, courteous, caring, and promptly attend to maintenance issues. We have monthly scheduled events, such as potlucks, birthday celebrations, and variety of fun activities.

Personally, I would love to see newer appliances, instead of the outdated ones. Doing away with the existing carpet, which some of the units still have (including mine). Adding a washer and dryer in the apartments. Otherwise, I like living here.

owner_response.text:
Hello Lucy, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments and we're happy we could meet your expectations! 
Regards,
The Woodrose Team

google_reviews.author: Lucy T
google_reviews.review: Overall, its a good place to live. Its well maintained, nice library, clean, friendly and caring staff, safe, pet friendly community. Monthly potlucks, birthday celebrations, games, all held in the community rooms. Woodrose provides ample parking, nice courtyard, different size apartments, elevators, and friendly neighbors. I just wish, we had our own laundry units, within the apartments and a small balcony.

owner_response.text:

thank you for taking the time to leave a nice review for us at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments. If there's anything we can do for you, we are happy to help!

I called many other places and toured a few never had that welcome home feeling i get here ..   if your thinking of moving here  ,you wont be unhappy with your choice.  Janne

google_reviews.author: Steven Perry
google_reviews.review:
UPDATE: Contacted the main office and they were able to work with my grandma to get her down from the top floor. Very kind and worked with us to quickly remedy the situation. Thank you very much Woodrose Apartments.

Grandma lives here on the top floor it is so hot up there its unbearable! They said it will cost her to move to lower levels crazy!

owner_response.text: Hi Steven,Thank you for the review! We absolutely agree that the top floors can get very warm during the Summer months in our communities without A/C. I can assure you it wasn't much better on the lower levels during this recent heat wave. There are some things we can do to assist. Please contact the office so that we can help remedy the situation. Thank you again!

google_reviews.review: Great staff and maintenance and people so they get one big giant star each.  We have to think hard about what else to say about actually living here, the cost and the conditions..

google_reviews.author: Melissa Loomis
google_reviews.review: New (owners?) made my grandma's last days very stressful and miserable; not what she needed with a heart condition for sure. She loved her friends in the building, some of the sweetest neighbors. She wasn't allowed to enjoy the small things in life after being there for years. "No flower beds, no figurines, just beauty bark" = remove everything you find joy in. Not the right thing to do to anyone, besides those who only have fewer moments to live them.

google_reviews.author: Susan Haase
google_reviews.review: The buildings are dingy inside.  No amenities of any kind.  The website is inaccurate--there is no fitness room.  We feel threatened by the homeless that come onto the property to steal and can smell the exhaust from Sunset during the evening commute.  Not a pleasant place to live.

owner_response.text: Thank you for reaching out regarding your concerns. Please direct any concerns regarding mask mandates to the office. We appreciate you taking the time to review!

summary.text:
Good

Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments enjoys a solid reputation for its well-maintained facilities and courteous staff. Numerous user reviews highlight the clean and organized common areas, making it inviting for visitors and residents alike. The surrounding locality offers convenient access to essential amenities such as grocery stores and public transport, creating ease of living for its tenants. Many residents appreciate the proactive and swift maintenance services, ensuring that problems are dealt with promptly and efficiently. The staff, often mentioned by name, have garnered respect and praise for their professionalism and friendly approach, enhancing the experience of living at Woodrose.

Great

The apartments receive high marks for their sense of community and vibrant social life, which many residents find enriching. Woodrose Apartments offer various activities and events, such as potlucks and bingo nights, contributing to a delightful living experience for the residents. Tenants have commended the management for creating a welcoming atmosphere, with one review reflecting how staff go above and beyond to help, even facilitating a tenant's move from a hot top floor unit to a more comfortable setting. The attention to detail in maintaining safety and cleanliness, coupled with engaging community events, stands out as a major highlight for those living here. These factors strongly contribute to the popularity of Woodrose Apartments among senior residents.

Bad

Despite many positive reviews, a few users shared concerns about the outdated features of the apartments. Some residents expressed a desire for the inclusion of newer appliances and in-unit laundry facilities, which are currently absent. There are also mentions of the noise from nearby roads and issues with homeless individuals on the property, contributing to discomfort for some tenants. Additionally, the absence of a fitness room, as would be expected from the information on the website, was noted as a downside by certain users, pointing to discrepancies in the listed amenities versus actual offerings.

Ugly

A minority of reviews exposed more serious grievances related to the management's handling of tenant requests and amenities policy changes. One particularly dissatisfied review highlighted how management imposed restrictions on personal decorations like flower beds and figurines, which deeply affected the tenant's quality of life. Another review recounted issues involving safety and upkeep, where certain tenants felt threatened by external factors such as nearby homeless individuals. These serious concerns presented by a few reviews underline the importance of ensuring a consistent and positive experience for all apartment residents.
